titleStmt.title: A speech made to his Excellency George Monck General, &c. the twelfth day of Aprill, M.DC.LX. At a solemn entertainment at Vinteners-Hal. Wherein his illustrious virtues are shaddowed forth under the emblem of a vine.
titleStmt.author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Welcome (Great Sir) thrice welcome to this Hall;".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
